block.Description: Number of block shown with pause in between

fix_duration.Description: How long the fixation cross was displayed on that trial

fix_onset_time.Description: When, relative to the start of the trial, the fixation cross was intended to be shown

fixation_time.Description: When, relative to the start of the trial, the fixation cross was actually shown

isi_duration.Description: Intended amount of time between showing fixation cross and showing the target

go_time.Description: When, relative to the start of the trial, the target (< or >) was shown

left_or_right.Description: Whether a left or a right carrot (arrow) was shown

response_time.Description: Time of the response relative to the start of the trial

fast_or_slow.Description: Whether the subject was limited in their response time (slow) or not

trial_length.Description: The total length of the trial

trial_number.Description: Order that this stimulus was shown

RT.Description: Response time relative to the target onset

keypressed.Description: Which key was pressed (Psychtoolbox key code)

pd_parser_sample.Description: The sample index of the electrophysiology data found by `pd-parser` for when the trial cue was shown
